sentences.pinyin: nǐ wèi shén me xué hàn yǔ
sentences.english: Why do you learn Chinese?
sentences.japanese: なぜ中国語を学びますか？
sentences.japanese_romaji: Naze chūgokugo wo manabimasu ka?

sentences.sentence: 我希望能说一口流利的汉语
sentences.pinyin: wǒ xī wàng néng shuō yī kǒu liú lì de hàn yǔ
sentences.korean: 유창한 중국어를 할 수 있기를 희망합니다
sentences.english: I hope to be able to speak fluent Chinese
sentences.japanese: 流暢な中国語を話せるようになりたいです
sentences.japanese_romaji: Ryūchō na chūgokugo wo hanaseru you ni naritai desu

sentences.pinyin: gēn zhōng guó rén jiāo péng yǒu
sentences.english: Make friends with Chinese people
sentences.japanese: 中国人と友達になりたい
sentences.japanese_romaji: Chūgokujin to tomodachi ni naritai

meaning_and_reading: 가운데 중, 나라 국, 사람 인

sentences.pinyin: gōng sī pài wǒ lái xué xí de
sentences.english: The company sent me here to study
sentences.japanese: 会社が私を勉強に派遣したのです
sentences.japanese_romaji: Kaisha ga watashi wo benkyō ni haken shita no desu

sentences.sentence: 咱们俩每天都可以练习说汉语
sentences.pinyin: zán men liǎ měi tiān dōu kě yǐ liàn xí shuō hàn yǔ
sentences.korean: 우리 둘은 매일 중국어 말하기를 연습할 수 있어요
sentences.english: We two can practice speaking Chinese every day
sentences.japanese: 私たち二人は毎日中国語を話す練習ができます
sentences.japanese_romaji: Watashitachi futari wa mainichi chūgokugo wo hanasu renshū ga dekimasu

sentences.sentence: 希望学习结束的时候，我能说一口流利的汉语
sentences.pinyin: xī wàng xué xí jié shù de shí hòu, wǒ néng shuō yī kǒu liú lì de hàn yǔ
sentences.korean: 학습이 끝날 때까지 유창한 중국어를 할 수 있기를 바라요
sentences.english: I hope I can speak fluent Chinese when the study ends
sentences.japanese: 勉強が終わる時に、流暢な中国語を話せるようになりたいです
sentences.japanese_romaji: Benkyō ga owaru toki ni, ryūchō na chūgokugo wo hanaseru you ni naritai desu

sentences.sentence: 这个暑假，我要一边学汉语，一边学京剧
sentences.pinyin: zhè ge shǔ jià, wǒ yào yī biān xué hàn yǔ, yī biān xué jīng jù
sentences.korean: 이번 여름방학에 중국어도 배우고 경극도 배울 거예요
sentences.english: This summer vacation, I want to learn Chinese while learning Beijing Opera
sentences.japanese: この夏休みは中国語を学びながら京劇も学びたいです
sentences.japanese_romaji: Kono natsuyasumi wa chūgokugo wo manabi nagara kyōgeki mo manabitai desu

sentences.pinyin: nǐ huì chàng jīng jù
sentences.english: Can you sing Beijing Opera?
sentences.japanese: 京劇を歌えますか？
sentences.japanese_romaji: Kyōgeki wo utaemasu ka?

sentences.pinyin: nǐ kàn le jīn tiān de xīn wén ma
sentences.english: Did you watch today's news?
sentences.japanese: 今日のニュースを見ましたか？
sentences.japanese_romaji: Kyō no nyūsu wo mimashita ka?

sentences.pinyin: kàn le, zhēn kǒng bù
sentences.english: I watched it, really scary
sentences.japanese: 見ました、本当に怖いです
sentences.japanese_romaji: Mimashita, hontō ni kowai desu

sentences.pinyin: xīn guān fèi yán huàn zhě tè bié duō
sentences.english: COVID-19 patients are especially numerous
sentences.japanese: 新型コロナ肺炎の患者が特に多いです
sentences.japanese_romaji: Shingata korona haien no kanja ga toku ni ōi desu

sentences.pinyin: zán men yě duō jiā xiǎo xīn ba
sentences.english: Let's also be more careful
sentences.japanese: 私たちももっと気をつけましょう
sentences.japanese_romaji: Watashitachi mo motto ki wo tsukemashō

sentences.sentence: 带好口罩，勤洗手，少出门
sentences.pinyin: dài hǎo kǒu zhào, qín xǐ shǒu, shǎo chū mén
sentences.korean: 마스크 잘 쓰고, 손 자주 씻고, 외출 적게 하세요
sentences.english: Wear masks properly, wash hands frequently, go out less
sentences.japanese: マスクをちゃんと着けて、手をこまめに洗って、外出を減らしてください
sentences.japanese_romaji: Masuku wo chanto tsukete, te wo komame ni aratte, gaishutsu wo herashite kudasai

sentences.sentence: 戴口罩、勤洗手也很重要
sentences.pinyin: dài kǒu zhào, qín xǐ shǒu yě hěn zhòng yào
sentences.korean: 마스크 쓰고 손 자주 씻는 것도 매우 중요해요
sentences.english: Wearing masks and washing hands frequently are also very important
sentences.japanese: マスクを着け、手をこまめに洗うこともとても大切です
sentences.japanese_romaji: Masuku wo tsuke, te wo komame ni arau koto mo totemo taisetsu desu

sentences.sentence: 我们要注意防护，保护好自己
sentences.pinyin: wǒ men yào zhù yì fáng hù, bǎo hù hǎo zì jǐ
sentences.korean: 우리는 방호에 주의하고 자신을 잘 보호해야 해요
sentences.english: We need to pay attention to protection and protect ourselves well
sentences.japanese: 私たちは防護に気をつけて、自分をしっかり守らなければなりません
sentences.japanese_romaji: Watashitachi wa bōgo ni ki wo tsukete, jibun wo shikkari mamoranakereba narimasen

sentences.sentence: 我觉得疫苗和治疗药都很重要
sentences.pinyin: wǒ jué de yì miáo hé zhì liáo yào dōu hěn zhòng yào
sentences.korean: 백신과 치료약 둘 다 매우 중요하다고 생각해요
sentences.english: I think vaccines and therapeutic drugs are both very important
sentences.japanese: ワクチンと治療薬はどちらもとても大切だと思います
sentences.japanese_romaji: Wakuchin to chiryōyaku wa dochira mo totemo taisetsu da to omoimasu

meaning_and_reading: 다스릴 치, 치료할 료, 약 약

sentences.pinyin: xiǎo xīn lèi huài le shēn tǐ

sentences.japanese_romaji: Karada wo tsukare de kowasanai you ni ki wo tsukete kudasai

sentences.japanese_romaji: Dochū ki wo tsukete, anzen ni chūi shite kudasai

sentences.english: The government should take measures

sentences.japanese_romaji: Seifu wa taisaku wo toru beki desu

sentences.sentence: 我们每个人都要保护环境
sentences.pinyin: wǒ men měi ge rén dōu yào bǎo hù huán jìng

meaning_and_reading: 뛰어넘을 월, 올 래, 뛰어넘을 월

sentences.english: Do you have investment experience?
sentences.japanese: 投資の経験はありますか？
sentences.japanese_romaji: Tōshi no keiken wa arimasu ka?

sentences.sentence: 我比较保守，喜欢存银行
sentences.pinyin: wǒ bǐ jiào bǎo shǒu, xǐ huan cún yín háng
sentences.korean: 저는 비교적 보수적이어서 은행에 저축하는 것을 좋아해요
sentences.english: I'm relatively conservative and prefer saving in banks
sentences.japanese: 私は比較的保守的で、銀行に預けることを好みます
sentences.japanese_romaji: Watashi wa hikaku-teki hoshuteki de, ginkō ni azukeru koto wo konomimasu

sentences.pinyin: fēng xiǎn tài dà le
sentences.english: The risk is too big
sentences.japanese: リスクが大きすぎます
sentences.japanese_romaji: Risuku ga ōkisugimasu

sentences.pinyin: hái shì yào fēn sàn tóu zī
sentences.english: We should still diversify our investments
sentences.japanese: やはり分散投資をすべきです
sentences.japanese_romaji: Yahari bunsan tōshi wo subeki desu

sentences.sentence: 刚才我去他那儿的时候，他正在给一家公司打电话
sentences.pinyin: gāng cái wǒ qù tā nàr de shí hòu, tā zhèng zài gěi yī jiā gōng sī dǎ diàn huà
sentences.korean: 방금 제가 그에게 갔을 때, 그는 한 회사에 전화를 하고 있었어요
sentences.english: When I went to his place just now, he was making a phone call to a company
sentences.japanese: さっき私が彼のところに行った時、彼は会社に電話をしていました
sentences.japanese_romaji: Sakki watashi ga kare no tokoro ni itta toki, kare wa kaisha ni denwa wo shite imashita

sentences.sentence: 听说这家公司正在招聘职员
sentences.pinyin: tīng shuō zhè jiā gōng sī zhèng zài zhāo pìn zhí yuán
sentences.korean: 이 회사에서 직원을 채용하고 있다고 들었어요

sentences.japanese: この会社が職員を募集していると聞きました
sentences.japanese_romaji: Kono kaisha ga shokuin wo boshū shite iru to kikimashita

sentences.pinyin: tā dǎ suàn qù yìng pìn
sentences.english: He plans to go and apply for the job
sentences.japanese: 彼は応募しに行く予定です
sentences.japanese_romaji: Kare wa ōbo shi ni iku yotei desu

sentences.sentence: 如果成功的话，下个月就开始工作

sentences.english: If successful, he will start working next month
sentences.japanese: 成功すれば来月から仕事を始めます
sentences.japanese_romaji: Seikō sureba raigetsu kara shigoto wo hajimemasu

sentences.sentence: 要是明天不下雨，我们就去爬山

sentences.japanese_romaji: Ashita ame ga furanakereba, watashitachi wa yamanobori ni ikimasu

meaning_and_reading: 아닐 불, 아래 하, 비 우

sentences.sentence: 如果你有时间的话，我们一起去看电影
sentences.pinyin: rú guǒ nǐ yǒu shí jiān de huà, wǒ men yī qǐ qù kàn diàn yǐng
sentences.korean: 시간 있으시면 우리 함께 영화 보러 가요

sentences.japanese_romaji: Jikan ga areba, issho ni eiga wo mi ni ikimashou

sentences.sentence: 除非他亲自来，否则我不相信
sentences.pinyin: chú fēi tā qīn zì lái, fǒu zé wǒ bù xiāng xìn
sentences.korean: 그가 직접 오지 않는 한 저는 믿지 않아요

sentences.japanese: 彼が直接来ない限り、私は信じません
sentences.japanese_romaji: Kare ga chokusetsu konai kagiri, watashi wa shinjimansen

meaning_and_reading: 아닐 불, 서로 상, 믿을 신

sentences.pinyin: zhǐ yào nǔ lì, yī dìng huì chéng gōng
sentences.english: As long as you work hard, you will surely succeed
sentences.japanese: 努力さえすれば必ず成功します
sentences.japanese_romaji: Doryoku sae sureba kanarazu seikō shimasu

sentences.sentence: 如果我是你，我就不会这么做

sentences.korean: 제가 당신이라면 이렇게 하지 않을 거예요
sentences.english: If I were you, I wouldn't do it this way
sentences.japanese: もし私があなただったら、こんなことはしません
sentences.japanese_romaji: Moshi watashi ga anata dattara, konna koto wa shimasen

sentences.sentence: 要是早知道，我就不来了
sentences.pinyin: yào shì zǎo zhī dào, wǒ jiù bù lái le

meaning_and_reading: 이를 조, 알 지, 길 도

sentences.japanese: 早く知っていたら、来なかったのに
sentences.japanese_romaji: Hayaku shitte itara, konakatta no ni

sentences.sentence: 假如明天下雨，比赛就取消
sentences.pinyin: jiǎ rú míng tiān xià yǔ, bǐ sài jiù qǔ xiāo
sentences.english: If it rains tomorrow, the game will be canceled
sentences.japanese: 明日雨が降ったら、試合は中止になります

meaning_and_reading: 어찌 증, 어찌 마, 꾸밀 판

sentences.english: If there's a problem, you're responsible
sentences.japanese: 万が一問題が起きたら、あなたが責任を負います
sentences.japanese_romaji: Man ga ichi mondai ga okitara, anata ga sekinin wo oimasu

sentences.sentence: 只有努力学习，才能取得好成绩
sentences.pinyin: zhǐ yǒu nǔ lì xué xí, cái néng qǔ dé hǎo chéng jì
sentences.meaning: 열심히 공부해야만 좋은 성적을 얻을 수 있어요

sentences.japanese: 一生懸命勉強してこそ、良い成績を取ることができます
sentences.japanese_romaji: Isshōkenmei benkyō shite koso, yoi seiseki wo toru koto ga dekimasu

sentences.sentence: 除非你答应，否则我不走
sentences.pinyin: chú fēi nǐ dā yìng, fǒu zé wǒ bù zǒu
sentences.meaning: 당신이 승낙하지 않으면 저는 가지 않을 거예요
sentences.english: Unless you agree, I won't leave
sentences.japanese: あなたが同意しない限り、私は行きません
sentences.japanese_romaji: Anata ga dōi shinai kagiri, watashi wa ikimasen

sentences.pinyin: wú lùn duō nán, wǒ dōu huì jiān chí
sentences.english: No matter how difficult, I will persist
sentences.japanese: どんなに困難でも、私は諦めません
sentences.japanese_romaji: Donna ni konnan demo, watashi wa akiramemasen

sentences.sentence: 不管怎么样，我们都支持你
sentences.pinyin: bù guǎn zěn me yàng, wǒ men dōu zhī chí nǐ

meaning_and_reading: 어찌 증, 어찌 마, 모양 양

sentences.english: No matter what, we all support you

sentences.japanese_romaji: Donna koto ga atte mo, watashitachi wa anata wo ōen shimasu

sentences.sentence: 因为下雨，所以比赛取消了

sentences.japanese: 交通渋滞のため、遅刻しました

sentences.sentence: 既然你不同意，那就算了

meaning_and_reading: 아닐 불, 같을 동, 뜻 의

sentences.english: Since you don't agree, let's forget it

sentences.japanese_romaji: Anata ga dōi shinai nara, yamemashō

sentences.sentence: 多亏了你的帮助，我才成功了

sentences.pinyin: zhè yàng zuò de jié guǒ shì shén me

sentences.japanese_romaji: Kō suru koto no kekka wa nan desu ka?

sentences.sentence: 他的努力终于有了回报

sentences.english: Rather than taking the bus, it's better to take the subway

sentences.japanese_romaji: Basu ni noru yori mo, chikatetsu ni notta hou ga ii desu

sentences.sentence: 宁可累一点，也不愿意迟到

sentences.english: I'd rather be a little tired than be late
sentences.japanese: 遅刻するよりも、少し疲れた方がましです
sentences.japanese_romaji: Chikoku suru yori mo, sukoshi tsukareta hou ga mashi desu

sentences.sentence: 他不像表面看起来那么简单
sentences.pinyin: tā bù xiàng biǎo miàn kàn qǐ lái nà me jiǎn dān

sentences.japanese: タクシーに乗るよりも、歩いた方がいいです
sentences.japanese_romaji: Takushī ni noru yori mo, aruita hou ga ii desu

sentences.sentence: 相比之下，这个方案更好
sentences.pinyin: xiāng bǐ zhī xià, zhè ge fāng àn gèng hǎo
sentences.meaning: 비교해 보니 이 방안이 더 좋아요
sentences.english: In comparison, this one is cheaper
sentences.japanese: 比較すると、こちらの方が安いです
sentences.japanese_romaji: Hikaku suru to, kochira no hou ga yasui desu

sentences.pinyin: běi fāng gēn nán fāng bù yī yàng

meaning_and_reading: 아닐 불, 하나 일, 모양 양

sentences.english: The North and South are different
sentences.japanese: 北方と南方は違います
sentences.japanese_romaji: Hoppō to nanpō wa chigaimasu

sentences.sentence: 城市和农村有很大区别
sentences.pinyin: chéng shì hé nóng cūn yǒu hěn dà qū bié
sentences.english: There's a big difference between cities and rural areas
sentences.japanese: 都市と農村には大きな違いがあります
sentences.japanese_romaji: Toshi to nōson ni wa ōkina chigai ga arimasu

sentences.pinyin: tā men liǎ xìng gé wán quán bù tóng

meaning_and_reading: 동녘 동, 서녘 서, 모 방

sentences.english: The cultural differences between East and West are obvious
sentences.japanese: 東西の文化の違いは明らかです
sentences.japanese_romaji: Tōzai no bunka no chigai wa akiraka desu

sentences.sentence: 这次跟上次的情况相反
sentences.pinyin: zhè cì gēn shàng cì de qíng kuàng xiāng fǎn
sentences.english: He came to China to learn Chinese
sentences.japanese: 彼は中国語を学ぶために中国に来ました
sentences.japanese_romaji: Kare wa chūgokugo wo manabu tame ni Chūgoku ni kimashita

sentences.sentence: 为了学好中文，他每天都练习
sentences.pinyin: wèi le xué hǎo zhōng wén, tā měi tiān dōu liàn xí
sentences.meaning: 중국어를 잘 배우기 위해 그는 매일 연습해요
sentences.english: She studies hard to find a good job
sentences.japanese: 彼女は良い仕事を見つけるために一生懸命勉強します
sentences.japanese_romaji: Kanojo wa yoi shigoto wo mitsukeru tame ni isshōkenmei benkyō shimasu

sentences.sentence: 他去中国是为了做生意
sentences.pinyin: tā qù zhōng guó shì wèi le zuò shēng yì
sentences.meaning: 그가 중국에 가는 것은 사업을 하기 위해서예요
sentences.english: He goes to China to do business
sentences.japanese: 彼は商売をするために中国に行きます
sentences.japanese_romaji: Kare wa shōbai wo suru tame ni Chūgoku ni ikimasu

sentences.sentence: 我们这么做是为了大家的利益
sentences.pinyin: wǒ men zhè me zuò shì wèi le dà jiā de lì yì
sentences.meaning: 우리가 이렇게 하는 것은 모두의 이익을 위해서예요
sentences.english: We do this for everyone's benefit
sentences.japanese: 私たちは皆の利益のためにこれをします
sentences.japanese_romaji: Watashitachi wa mina no rieki no tame ni kore wo shimasu

sentences.sentence: 为了不让父母担心，他没说实话
sentences.pinyin: wèi le bù ràng fù mǔ dān xīn, tā méi shuō shí huà
sentences.meaning: 부모님을 걱정시키지 않기 위해 그는 실화를 말하지 않았어요
sentences.english: He succeeded by relying on his own efforts
sentences.japanese: 彼は自分の努力に頼って成功しました
sentences.japanese_romaji: Kare wa jibun no doryoku ni tayotte seikō shimashita

sentences.sentence: 通过努力，他实现了目标
sentences.pinyin: tōng guò nǔ lì, tā shí xiàn le mù biāo
sentences.english: According to regulations, we cannot do this
sentences.japanese: 規定によると、私たちはこれをすることができません
sentences.japanese_romaji: Kitei ni yoru to, watashitachi wa kore wo suru koto ga dekimasen

sentences.sentence: 借助现代科技，工作效率提高了
sentences.pinyin: jiè zhù xiàn dài kē jì, gōng zuò xiào lǜ tí gāo le
sentences.meaning: 현대 과학기술의 도움으로 업무 효율이 높아졌어요
sentences.english: According to the weather forecast, it will rain tomorrow
sentences.japanese: 天気予報によると、明日は雨が降ります
sentences.japanese_romaji: Tenki yohō ni yoru to, ashita wa ame ga furimasu

sentences.sentence: 利用业余时间，他学会了开车
sentences.pinyin: lì yòng yè yú shí jiān, tā xué huì le kāi chē
sentences.english: Using his spare time, he learned to drive
sentences.japanese: 余暇時間を利用して、彼は運転を覚えました
sentences.japanese_romaji: Yoka jikan wo riyō shite, kare wa unten wo oboemashita

sentences.sentence: 凭借自己的能力，她获得了成功
sentences.pinyin: píng jiè zì jǐ de néng lì, tā huò dé le chéng gōng
sentences.meaning: 자신의 능력에 의존해서 그녀는 성공을 얻었어요
sentences.english: By relying on her own abilities, she achieved success
sentences.japanese: 自分の能力に頼って、彼女は成功を収めました
sentences.japanese_romaji: Jibun no nōryoku ni tayotte, kanojo wa seikō wo osaemashita
